title: Perfect Niche? | Amazon KDP Niche Research for Low Content Books (What No One Wants To Tell You) #14

tactics.name: category_ranking
tactics.description: Identify niches by leveraging Publisher Rocket's category search to find undersaturated markets with high search volume
steps: Use Publisher Rocket for keyword research
Check category rankings for untapped niches
caveats: May fail if niche is oversaturated
source_quotes: i look for the best ranking categories categories that not many people use

tactics.name: sales_calculation
tactics.description: Estimate monthly earnings by analyzing daily sales and royalty rates
steps: Calculate daily sales from BSR rank
caveats: Does not account for price changes
source_quotes: we're going to do 1900 times the royalty so how much this book making

tactics.name: Use Publisher Rocket for Niche Validation
tactics.description: Identify niches with high search volume and low competition using Publisher Rocket data
caveats: When niche saturation exceeds tool predictions
source_quotes: they're using public publisher rocket too because they know people are actively searching

tactics.name: Niche Down to Reduce Competition
tactics.description: Refine broad niches by adding specific keywords to lower search results and competition
steps: Identify broad niche keywords (e.g., 'cursive writing workbook')
Add specific modifiers (e.g., 'Bible Christian') to narrow the niche
Analyze BSR and review counts for optimized niches
caveats: May not work for highly saturated markets
source_quotes: when we niche down folder we can reduce the number of competition

heuristics.name: category_boost
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts but high category rankings, prioritize it
source_quotes: i look for the best ranking categories categories that not many people use

heuristics.name: Low Review Threshold Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niche
source_quotes: average monthly earnings about a thousand dollars you have estimated multi

heuristics.name: Price Optimization for Visibility
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize price adjustments
source_quotes: recommend you pricing lowered at least maybe even 4.99 or five dollars itself

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket is a one-time purchase tool for niche research
source_quotes: publisher rocket is a one-time payment two it's not a monthly service

claims.statement: Bible cursive workbook has over 1000 searches
source_quotes: bible cursive i write a workbook for kids if you want to uh niche down further

claims.statement: Niche-specific products with low competition achieve higher BSR rankings
source_quotes: bible christian variety workbook for kids is actually the best niche

niche_patterns.description: Combine target audience with specific skill gaps and add value through supplementary content
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Addresses functional need while incorporating motivational elements for engagement
source_quotes: it's not just a regular writing book but it is a motivational book
